# Ranking number of international departures as a proportion of total population
```{r}
tourism <- read.csv("F://IntroDSproject/WDI data split/Population.csv")

tourism <- select(tourism, "CountryName", "Year", "ST.INT.DPRT", "SP.POP.TOTL")
tourism <- tourism[order(-tourism$Year),]
tourism <- na.omit(tourism)
tourism <- tourism %>% distinct(CountryName, .keep_all = TRUE)
tourism <- mutate(tourism, rank.tourism = rank(tourism$FP.CPI.tourism.ZG))
tourism$rank.tourism<- as.numeric(as.factor(tourism$rank.tourism))
View(tourism)

write.csv(tourism, file = "tourism.csv")
```
